articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Autographs to Officials and Workers of Various Units
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Autographs to Officials and Workers of Various Units
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent autographs to officials and other workers at various units and teachers and students on Sept. 13 and 27 after reading their letters.
					 In the letters they expressed their determination to make a dynamic advance in close unity under the leadership of the party, bearing deep in mind warm love and trust shown by the great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Among them were officials and employees of the Tanchon Area General Mining Bureau, the construction site of Orangchon Power Station, Electric Power Designing Institute No. 1, Pyongyang Tangogi Restaurant, Phyongnam Noodle Restaurant and the Wheat Cake Stuffed with Roast Chicken Shop of the Kumsong Foodstuff Factory and builders and teachers and students of Sibyon Secondary School of Thosan County, North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 In the letters they reflected their ardent reverence and loyalty to Marshal Kim Jong Un who helps them make a leaping advance with the same loving care as that shown by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They vowed to invariably follow Kim Jong Un to repay for his loving care in the road of successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu in keeping pace with his footsteps despite any storm and stress.
					
					 They wholeheartedly wished Marshal Kim Jong Un good health for the eternal prosperity of Songun Korea and happiness of all generations to come, representing the best wishes of all servicepersons and people.

articles.title: Greetings to King of Lesotho
articles.content:
Greetings to King of Lesotho
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greeting to Letsie III, king of Lesotho, on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields in the future and wished the king and the people of Lesotho success in their efforts for the peace and development of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to New Dominican President
articles.content:
Greetings to New Dominican President
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Sep. 29 sent a message of greeting to Eliud Thaddeus Williams on his taking office as president of Dominica.
					 Kim in the message wished the president success in his responsible work for the country's development and people's welfare.

articles.title: South Korean Regime Accused of Provoking DPRK
articles.content:
South Korean Regime Accused of Provoking DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea gave the following answer to a question put by the KCNA as regards the scheme of the south Korean regime to put its provocation attempt into practice by irritating the DPRK with militant actions almost every day.
					 The puppet regime infiltrated its warships deep into the territorial waters of the DPRK southwest of Yonphyong Islands and fired bullets and shells at civilian fishing boats of a foreign country. Following this grave military provocation, it has resorted to war-like actions, seriously irritating the DPRK.
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak said at an urgent meeting of the ministers in charge of foreign affairs and security on Sept. 26 that south Korea should strictly cope with the north's politically-motivated and planned provocation, while getting it ready for the forthcoming election.
					
					 Jong Sung Jo, chairman of the south Korean Joint Chiefs of Staff, toured the 7th division and 2nd corps of the army in the forefront on Sept. 28. He said there may be enemy provocation at any time and called for immediately and resolutely countering the provocation, regarding it as an opportunity.
					
					 Kim Kwan Jin, minister of Defense, appeared at the 2nd Fleet Command of the navy where he called for keeping fully prepared while let loose a spate of invectives about the north's possible provocation by way of trumpeting in the east and attacking in the west.
					
					 The warmongers reinforced five islands in the West Sea of Korea and their surrounding waters with troops, artillery pieces, various types of missiles, fighters and warships and made a fuss as if something serious had happened.
					
					 The Lee group made such reckless remarks as "threat from the north" and "sign of provocation" even at UN session and made vain efforts to build up public opinion over "north wind" as evidenced by its anti-DPRK confab with its U.S. master.
					
					 In step with this, the ultra conservative media, philistine and human scum are busy spreading the "rumor of the north's intervention in the presidential election". They are alleging that the north is creating instability ahead of the presidential election in south Korea and that there is possibility of additional provocation.
					
					 Those bellicose remarks and frantic anti-DPRK racket are intentional and planned provocation aimed to orchestrate a shocking incident like military conflict by getting on the nerves of the DPRK to the extremes in a bid to get rid of the ruin and turn the table in favor of the conservative forces' stay in power.
					
					 Historically, the south Korean puppets have tried to find a way out in fabricating a groundless story about the "north wind" whenever they faced major political momentum and ruling crisis.
					
					 In June 2010 they cooked up the hideous farce of "Cheonan" warship sinking incident for their vicious purposes to calm down the anger of the people at the "government" before the local election and secure the ruling stability with smooth election.
					
					 Afterwards, the bold measure of the DPRK for improving the inter-Korean relations created big splashes in the south Korean public and the atmosphere of the movement against the confrontation policy mounted. But the warmongers hatched a military conflict like Yonphyong Islands shelling case and it resulted in chilling the hard-won atmosphere of improving the north-south relations.
					
					 The south Korean war maniacs reinforced troops as never before in the biggest hotspots of the West Sea and cried out for "getting fully prepared", while crisscrossing the forefront areas. But their intention is nothing new.
					
					 Nobody would be deceived by their reckless remarks such as the "north's intervention in the presidential election" and "instability".
					
					 People are now sick of their old stereotyped trick.
					
					 The people inside and outside Korea clearly see who is the real provocateur and from where the danger of war comes through the military provocations of south Korea.
					
					 The hackneyed and threadbare "rumor of threat from the north" would arouse the public resentment against the group of traitors of south Korea and hasten its ruin.
					
					 The group should not run reckless, being aware that it will have to pay dearly for its provocation.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Federal Emigration Bureau of Russia
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Federal Emigration Bureau of Russia
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Federal Emigration Bureau of Russia.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned by Deputy Director Anatoli Kuznetsov who is heading the delegation on a visit to the DPRK on Thursday.

articles.title: DPRK Will Join UN Member Nations in Defending Global Peace and Stability: Head of DPRK Delegation
articles.content:
DPRK Will Join UN Member Nations in Defending Global Peace and Stability: Head of DPRK Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The head of the DPRK delegation made a speech at the plenary meeting of the 67th UN General Assembly Monday.
					 He said that the DPRK would further develop friendly and cooperative relations with all other countries respecting its sovereignty, true to its avowed idea of the foreign policy -- independence, peace and friendship -- and actively join the UN member nations in their efforts for defending global peace and stability and achieving sustained development.
					
					 The DPRK upholds the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un as the supreme leader of the party, state and army and is waging a vigorous drive to build a thriving socialist nation, he noted.
					
					 Referring to the use of force and state-sponsored terrorism unabated in the international arena at present aimed at the encroachment of sovereignty, interference in the internal affairs of other countries and overturn of social systems, he went on:
					
					 In order for the UN to fulfill its pivotal role in the international relations, it has to settle the urgent problems of democratizing the UN and increasing its authority, in particular.
					
					 It is quite natural for the General Assembly to have charge of all the UN activities as it speaks for the collective will of the member nations. It should also practice such authority as finally examining the resolutions of the Security Council on peace and security, those on sanctions and the use of force, in particular.
					
					 The reform of the Security Council, core agenda for the UN reform, brooks no further delay and it should be carried out on the principle of fully ensuring responsibility, transparency, impartiality and objectivity in activities and guaranteeing the right to representation of developing countries in formation.
					
					 An end should be put to the politicization, selectivity and double-standards when discussing the human rights issue. Never to be allowed is the continued creation of circumstances in which the human rights situation of some countries are called into question while that of other countries are ignored to meet political purposes and interests of the West and according to the standard of Western-style value.
					
					 The Korean Peninsula has become the biggest hotspot in the world due to the U.S. persistent hostile policy toward the DPRK. There persists the vicious cycle of confrontation and escalation of tensions that even a spark may lead to a thermonuclear war.
					
					 No issue including the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula can be settled unless the U.S. drops its hostile policy toward the DPRK. This is the review of the whole course of dialogue it has had with the U.S. and the lesson it has drawn through its experience.
					
					 The DPRK government will join hands with anyone who truly wants Korea's reunification and the nation's reconciliation and prosperity and make responsible and persevering efforts to frustrate outsiders' interference and anti-reunification forces' moves to perpetuate the country's division by concerted efforts of Koreans, and thus achieve the historic cause of national reunification.

articles.title: Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Egyptian Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam from Egyptian Ambassador
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Egyptian Ambassador to the DPRK Iman Mostafa Abdou Ahmed at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
					 Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Credentials to Fiji President
articles.content:
Credentials to Fiji President
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Ratu Epeli Nailatikau, president of Fiji, received credentials from Ri Jong Ryul, DPRK ambassador to his country, on September 27.
					 The president said at the meeting that the dear respected Kim Jong Un is a very young and energetic man.
					
					 He congratulated the people of the DPRK on great success in building the prosperous powerful nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health and greater success in the work for the country's prosperity and the improvement of the people's livelihood.
					
					 He hoped that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Singapore led by Permanent Secretary Bilahari Kausikan arrived here Thursday.
					 Inoke Kubuabola, minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Fiji, and his party flew back home on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK, China Ink MOU on Cooperation in Agriculture
articles.content:
DPRK, China Ink MOU on Cooperation in Agriculture 
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A MOU on cooperation in agriculture was signed between the Ministries of Agriculture of the DPRK and China in Pyongyang on Thursday.
					 Present at the inking ceremony from the DPRK side were Ri Sok Chol, vice-minister of Agriculture, and officials of the ministry and from the Chinese side the members of the visiting delegation of the Ministry of Agriculture of China led by Vice-Minister Niu Dun, and staff members of the Chinese embassy here.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Pay Respects to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Pay Respects to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests on Thursday visited the equestrian statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the Mansudae Art Studio to pay homage.
					 They included the members of the delegation of the Ministry of Agriculture of China led by Vice-Minister Niu Dun, Chairman and CEO Naguib Sawiris of the Orascom Telecom Media and Technology Holdings SAE of Egypt and his party.
					
					 They laid bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to the peerlessly great persons. 
					
					 Naguib Sawiris and his party arrived here on Thursday.

articles.title: Senior Official of Ministry of Agriculture of Guinea Tours Pyongyang
articles.content:
Senior Official of Ministry of Agriculture of Guinea Tours Pyongyang
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Famoi Beavogui, general director of the Agronomics Research of the Ministry of Agriculture of Guinea, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 He laid a bouquet before the old home of the President in Mangyongdae in humble reverence for him and looked round historic relics preserved there.
					
					 After the visit, he said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung was born to a patriotic and revolutionary family.
					
					 He possessed personality as a great man in his childhood.
					
					 It is thanks to his wise leadership that the Korean people could make laudable development.
					
					 His great exploits will shine forever.
					
					 The general director also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, Arch of Triumph, Three-Revolution Exhibition, etc.

articles.title: Reception Given by German Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by German Ambassador 
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Gerhard Thiedemann, German ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception in his embassy on Oct. 4 to mark its national day.
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, So Ho Won, chairman of the DPRK-Germany Friendship Association who is vice-chairman of the Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries of the DPRK, and officials concerned and foreign diplomats and representatives of international bodies here.
					
					 Present there were German embassy officials.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Nigerian Embassy Officials Visit Mangyongdae School Children's Palace
articles.content:
Nigerian Embassy Officials Visit Mangyongdae School Children's Palace
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Members of the Nigerian embassy here including Ambassador Nwofe Alexander visited the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace on Thursday to mark the 52nd anniversary of the independence of Nigeria.
					 They looked round several rooms of the palace, being briefed on the history of it which was built as a center for after-school education of the growing generation under the deep care of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 The ambassador said that the DPRK regards children as king of the country and schoolchildren are giving full bloom their hope and talents at good palace.
					
					 Then they enjoyed a performance by art group members of the palace.

articles.title: Vietnamese Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Vietnamese Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Vietnamese Ambassador to the DPRK Le Quang Ba and his embassy officials did friendship work at the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Migok Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, on Thursday.
					 They looked round historic relics, being briefed on the leadership feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the farm. 
					
					 They helped the farmers in rice harvesting.
					
					 The ambassador hoped that the farmers would stand in the van of the country in the agricultural production, true to the noble intention of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The guests handed over aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: 5th Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Observed
articles.content:
5th Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Observed
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the Central Hall of Workers in Pyongyang on Thursday, the 5th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, Ryu Mi Yong, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party, Choe Jin Su, president of the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, officials of social organizations, members of the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification, people and students in the city.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 He said the publication of the October 4 declaration made it possible to independently solve all issues in reunifying the country in line with the demand and interests of the nation in the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					 By adopting the declaration, leader Kim Jong Il gave momentum to the enthusiasm for independent reunification growing at home and abroad, thus bringing about the unprecedented golden days for national reconciliation and unity, he said and went on:
					
					 After the publication of the declaration contacts and dialogues between the north and the south were activated in politics, economy, military and other fields including a premiers' meeting and their joint propelling mechanisms were established, giving great spurs to its implementation on a nation-wide scale.
					
					 Through a drive to implement the declaration, all the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad cherished an immutable truth that pooling efforts of Koreans guarantees the reunification, common prosperity and a rosy future of the nation.
					
					 Along with the June 15 joint declaration provided by Kim Jong Il as a great programme for independent reunification in the new century, the October 4 declaration has proved its validity and vitality despite the serious challenges lying on the road to reunification.
					
					 Intensifying in south Korea and abroad are popular actions for punishing the regime that has sought sycophancy towards foreign forces and confrontation with countrymen to dampen the Koreans' desire for reunification during its tenure of office, and for continuously advancing the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 The exploits for reunification performed by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who opened up bright prospects for national prosperity have been reliably carried forward by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un is firmly defending the Generalissimos' idea and line for reunification and their undying feats, and encouraging all Koreans to a struggle for reunifying the country.
					
					 The historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 Declaration are a valuable heritage bequeathed by Kim Jong Il to his countrymen and a banner of reunification to be invariably held fast to by the nation.
					
					 It is because such anti-reunification forces as the Lee Myung Bak regime totally denied the joint declarations that dialogues, negotiations, contacts and exchanges between the north and the south were disrupted and even the humanitarian cooperation held back.
					
					 To implement the declarations is the only way for putting the north-south relations on the normal track, removing the danger of war and opening up a new era of independent reunification and common prosperity.
					
					 The DPRK will make persevering efforts to carry forward the June 15 era of reunification, the new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity, upholding the June 15 joint declaration, a great programme for reunification in the new century, and the October 4 declaration for implementing it.

articles.title: North, South and Overseas Organizations Call for Opening New Era of Independent Reunification, Peace and Prosperity
articles.content:
North, South and Overseas Organizations Call for Opening New Era of Independent Reunification, Peace and Prosperity
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The North, South and Overseas Side Committees for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration Thursday released an appeal to all Koreans at home and abroad on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 The declaration which clearly indicates practical ways for the country's peace, independent reunification and common prosperity is a precious fruition common to the nation which all Koreans achieved in the grand advance toward national reunification, the appeal said.
					
					 The adoption of the declaration opened a new broad avenue for putting an end to military standoff between the north and south and achieving peace and bringing earlier independent reunification, it noted.
					
					 However, this fruition was downplayed, the inter-Korean relations faced bankruptcy and a touch-and-go situation is prevailing in the Korean peninsula due to the moves of anti-reunification forces.
					
					 The North, South and Overseas Side Committees for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration appeal as follows to all Koreans at home and abroad out of unanimous mind to open a new phase for national reunification in line with the inter-Korean declarations:
					
					 Let all Koreans at home and abroad pool intention, efforts and wisdom to implement the north-south joint declarations!
					
					 Let's pull down all barriers standing in the way of visits and exchange between NGOs and activate contacts and dialogues among people from all walks of life!
					
					 Let's resolutely oppose all forms of joint military exercises and arms buildup which escalate distrust and hostility among fellow countrymen and threaten wellbeing of Koreans and peace on this land.
					
					 Let's dynamically fight to remove the source of war and establish permanent peace mechanism on this land!
					
					 Let's activate solidarity movement among organizations of different strata and fields in all regions in the north and the south and further enhance the role of the All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration!
					
					 Let's fully display enthusiasm and make concerted efforts to open a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity!

articles.title: Koreans Vow to Implement North-South Declarations
articles.content:
Koreans Vow to Implement North-South Declarations
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The North, South and Overseas Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) released the following joint statement on Thursday on the 5th anniversary of the October 4 declaration:
					 The October 4 declaration serves as a principle for action and a programme for practice that comprehensively deals with the ways for developing the north-south relations and achieving peace, reunification and prosperity of the nation in the basic spirit of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The adoption of the declaration was an event noteworthy in the nation's history as it gave confidence and optimism for reunification to all the Koreans and put their movement for independent reunification that had vigorously advanced toward a higher stage under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 If the October 4 declaration had been implemented smoothly, epochal events in the June 15 era of reunification would have taken place on this land, hastening the emergence of a peaceful and prosperous reunified country and giving more pleasures to the fellow countrymen.
					
					 However, the vicious moves of the Lee Myung Bak regime in south Korea to escalate confrontation with its countrymen dispirited the Koreans and dashed their hope.
					
					 Intolerable are the crimes committed by the anti-reunification forces in south Korea who barred the advance of the June 15 era and delayed the reunification. They are sure to face severe punishment by the nation.
					
					 What all the Koreans at home and abroad want today is the peace and independent reunification of the country and the common prosperity of the nation, not the confrontation and war between fellow countrymen.
					
					 Pomminryon will intensify the activities for implementing the north-south declarations and strengthen the tripartite solidarity to reject all kinds of acts that deny the declarations and interrupt their implementation.
					
					 Especially, it will strive to make it the trend of the times to implement the declarations by giving great momentum to the atmosphere for supporting the declarations.
					
					 It will take the lead in the actions against the reckless joint military exercises with foreign forces, arms buildup and terrorism and sabotage against fellow countrymen that are aimed to increase military tensions, bring a war and incite confrontation between the social systems.
					
					 For the present, it will resolutely reject the formation of the triangular military alliance which the present ruling forces in south Korea are pushing ahead with the U.S. and Japan and a military agreement with them sought by it.
					
					 With firm confidence and optimism about the rosy future and prospects of the Korean nation, Pomminryon will struggle more vigorously to bring about a turning point in the drive for independent reunification, peace and prosperity this year without fail, together with all other Koreans.

articles.title: Title of Labor Hero Awarded to Lathe No. 26 at Pyongyang Textile Machine Factory
articles.content:
Title of Labor Hero Awarded to Lathe No. 26 at Pyongyang Textile Machine Factory
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The DPRK awarded the title of labor hero of the DPRK and the gold medal (hammer and sickle) and the First Class of the Order of National Flag to the lathe No. 26 at the Pyongyang Textile Machine Factory.
					 Lathe No. 26 is the historic lathe which leader Kim Jong Il personally operated when he came to this factory for production practice during his days of study at Kim Il Sung University. 
					
					 He set a noble example of equipment and technological management and raised the torch of the model machine movement.
					
					 That machine had operated in full capacity over last more than 50 years and was modernized as CNC lathe. The lathe has greatly contributed to the building of a thriving nation by processing a large number of parts needed for the production of textile machines and custom-built equipment for major projects.
					
					 A decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly on awarding the title of labor hero to it was issued on Thursday.

articles.title: Taedonggang Building-materials Factory's Production Capacity Upgraded
articles.content:
Taedonggang Building-materials Factory's Production Capacity Upgraded
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The project for expanding the capacity of the Taedonggang Building-materials Factory was completed to be brought on line.
					 The upgraded capacity will enable the factory to produce dozens of kinds of building materials and distribute them to major construction sites including those in Pyongyang.
					
					 Present at an opening ceremony on Thursday were Premier Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and workers, technicians and officials of the factory.
					
					 A message of thanks sent by the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was conveyed to the workers, technicians and officials whose feats for the project are merited.
					
					 The message said the factory turned into a comprehensive building-materials factory, one of the best in the country, under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It highly praised the merited workers, technicians and officials of the factory for changing their factory into another edifice by displaying popular heroism and matchless devotion, keeping in mind pure faith in the party and leader and ardent patriotism.
					
					 Jang Su Gil, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, made an opening address which was followed by speeches.
					
					 Then the participants looked round the factory.

articles.title: Construction of Hoeryong Army-People Pig Farm Completed
articles.content:
Construction of Hoeryong Army-People Pig Farm Completed 
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The Hoeryong Army-People Pig Farm was newly built in North Hamgyong Province.
					 All the processes of the farm including fodder processing and supply, breeding and meat processing are furnished with modern equipment.  
					
					 The completion of the farm will contribute to the improvement of the living standard of the people in Hoeryong City by increasing the production of meat and varieties of processed pork.
					
					 The ceremony of the completion took place on Thursday.
					
					 Present there were Vice-Premier Kim In Sik, Jo Yong Chol, minister of Foodstuff and Daily Necessities Industry, Hwang Min, minister of Agriculture, O Su Yong, chief secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, service personnel, working people in Hoeryong City and members of youth shock brigades.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il made sure that the modern pig farm was built in Hoeryong City, and indicated the orientation and ways for the construction.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un took measures needed for successfully building the farm.
					
					 O Su Yong made an opening address at the ceremony.
					
					At the end of the ceremony, the participants toured the farm.

articles.title: Art Exhibition on Subject of Kim Jong Il's Patriotism Opens
articles.content:
Art Exhibition on Subject of Kim Jong Il's Patriotism Opens
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- An art exhibition on the subject of Kim Jong Il's patriotism is going on at the Pyongyang International Cultural Center.
					 On display there are various art pieces contributed by the artists in Pyongyang and provinces including Korean paintings, oil paintings, posters, calligraphic works, sculptures, woodcut prints and woodcrafts.
					
					  The Korean painting "To further spruce up the mountains and streams in the liberated country", the oil painting "Opening up a new history of Taegyedo Tideland" and other art works impressively show the undying exploits the commanders of Mt. Paektu performed by dedicating their whole life to the prosperity of the country and people's happiness.
					
					 Seen at the venue also were works including the Korean painting "Song of spring in Rakwon-ri" and the oil painting "New appearance of Pyongyang" which reflect the proud development of the country brought about by the patriotic devotion of leader Kim Jong Il who valued and loved even a blade of grass and a tree in homeland.
					
					 The oil painting "General and soldiers" and the embroidery "Cosmos along the road to the front" depict the features of Kim Jong Il as a great man who let the DPRK, patriotic legacy bequeathed by President Kim Il Sung, to demonstrate its dignity and might before the world by upholding the banner of Songun.
					
					 The Korean painting "Continued love" and the oil paining "The June 1st Children's Day" and other works portray the great pride and self-confidence of the Korean people holding in high esteem the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who is ushering in a new history of great love and devotion with boundlessly noble views on the homeland, people and posterity.
					
					 Among the exhibited art works are also those showing DPRK servicepersons and people who are dedicating their patriotic devotion to bringing about a prospering morrow of the country in all worksites.

articles.title: Hapjang River Improvement Project Launched in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Hapjang River Improvement Project Launched in Pyongyang
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons have launched a project for the improvement of the Hapjang River here.
					 The river is a stream flowing from Mt. Chongryong in South Phyongan Province to the Taedong River through Taesong District, Pyongyang.
					
					 The vast project includes removal of sludge, embankment improvement and repair of structures.
					
					 Those servicepersons already cleared out 75 percent of sludge in the river in two days after the start of the project by fully displaying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					  After finishing the removal of sludge from the Jangsan Bridge to the floodgate of the river, they set about its embankment project.
					
					 Despite the unfavorable conditions, they are hastening the project in an intensive way by making rational use of manpower, building equipment and other means. They carefully ensure the technical guidance over the embankment project while taking steps to repair the floodgate and other structures.
					
					 The construction site is replete with the militant stamina of the servicepersons, eager to complete the project at a stretch.
					
					 Loudspeaker cars air songs to encourage the servicepersons to speed up the project, part of the nature-remaking work aimed to carry into practice respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's grand plan for turning the mountains and rivers of the country more beautiful.

articles.title: Solar Water Heaters Introduced to Village in Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Solar Water Heaters Introduced to Village in Mangyongdae 
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Solar water heaters painted red and blue have been set up on the rooftops of dwelling houses, two for each house, in the village of Nam Ri, Mangyongdae, presenting the charming view of the countryside in harmony with Korean-style gabled roofs.
					  Every family is using hot water heated to the average of 55℃ by the water heaters.
					
					 Hot water runs from turned-on faucets and palm-size controllers attached to the kitchen walls indicate the water temperature.
					
					 In mid-winter the lowest water temperature was 35℃ while about 70℃ in the daytime last year. Now the temperature reaches 90℃, enough for cooking.
					
					 The profitable solar water heater has 1.5 square meters of the heat collection area and 80 percent of efficiency of light use. It, therefore, provides convenience to families irrespective of seasons and weather conditions.

articles.title: Foreigners Admire Rungna People's Pleasure Park
articles.content:
Foreigners Admire Rungna People's Pleasure Park
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Foreigners were deeply touched to see the Rungna People's Pleasure Park which was successfully built as a cultural pleasure resort under the deep loving care of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, said he visited the very fantastic pleasure park.
					
					 The sound of people's laughter reverberates far and wide in the park, he said.
					
					 He saw an asset for the people provided thanks to the noble intention of the WPK, he added.
					
					 Anatoli Dolgachev, chairman of the Far Eastern Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia, noted that he saw such a wonderful pleasure park for the first time in his life, adding that this place is deeply associated with the dear respected Kim Jong Un's noble love for the people.
					
					 Basanta Kumar Shrestha, chairman of the International Committee for the Study of Songun Politics for Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Nepal, said that Rungna People's Pleasure Park is a product of the love of the peerlessly great man for the people.
					
					 The Korean people are leading a happy life thanks to the prominent leader, he said.
					
					 He said after the visit that he keenly realized that the WPK led by Kim Jong Un serves the people.
					
					 Baranikova, editor-in-chief of a Russian paper, noted that she was deeply moved to visit the pleasure park.
					
					 Rungna People's Pleasure Park vividly shows the noble love for the people of leader Kim Jong Un, he added.
					
					 Pascal Zouncheme, chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, noted that the visitors to the pleasure park will come to keenly realize the Workers' Party of Korea's noble intention for the people. 
					
					 A member of the Far Eastern Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia said that ordinary people visit the pleasure park in the DPRK, adding it is because the WPK regards the people's wellbeing as the criteria of its activities. The DPRK is the people's country, he stressed.

articles.title: Rehabilitation from Flood Damage at Height in Komdok Area
articles.content:
Rehabilitation from Flood Damage at Height in Komdok Area 
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A dynamic drive is going on in Komdok area to recover from flood damage.
					 The construction of the dwelling houses is making headway thanks to the efforts of service personnel and people. Roads extending about hundred of kilometers and Paekgumsan-Kumgol railway tracks have been repaired and lots of production processes restarted their operation.
					
					 Soldiers of the Korean People's Army cleared the Tanchon-Komdok road of huge amount of earth and piles of stones, enlarging the width of road, and mended dozens of bridges.
					
					 Workers of the Ministry of Railways and its affiliated bureaus have channeled efforts into the structural projects including fortifying roadbeds, replacing rails and sleepers and building revetment in the spirit with which they brought the Tanchon-Paekgumsan railway tracks to normal service. They made such a great achievement as passing the train on the Paekgumsan-Kumgol railroad lines.
					
					 The construction of walls of houses for 300 families in Kumgol has been finished and the construction of hundreds of houses is making rapid progress in Taehung.
					
					 In Ryongyang Mine area the construction of over 50 houses has already been completed. 
					
					 The overall production processes have been rehabilitated by people of Komdok and several pits went operational for mineral production.
					
					 The seriously damaged ore carrier in Ryongyang Mine has been repaired and equipment are being run in Kumsan Pit and other faces of the mine.
					
					 Light Burning Shop No. 2 under the magnesia clinker branch and other units of Taehung Youth Hero Mine restarted production.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Opening Up Way for Independent Reunification in Line With North-South Declaration
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Opening Up Way for Independent Reunification in Line With North-South Declaration
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday editorially marks the fifth anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 The editorial says:
					
					 The October 4 declaration clarifies the ways for definitely turning the inter-Korean relations into those of mutual respect and trust in the spirit of "By our nation itself", building the lasting peace mechanism on the Korean Peninsula and developing the many-sided cooperation and exchange between the north and the south.
					
					 The adoption of the October 4 declaration was an epochal event that provided the guidelines common to the north and the south to develop the nation's unity and cooperation and the movement of the country's reunification to the higher stage on the basis of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Its adoption helped the Korean nation usher in the new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity with confidence, guided by the practical programme for comprehensively embodying the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Had the declarations been implemented, the north-south relations would have rapidly developed and our compatriots would have spurred the course of reconciliation and reunification with confidence, looking forward to the country's reunification.
					
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak seeking the inter-Korean confrontation took power in south Korea shortly after the adoption of the October 4 declaration. This laid big obstacles in the way for the implementation of the declarations.
					
					 The denial of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration amounts to the confrontation and war. This is the review and lesson drawn from the past five years.
					
					 Definite is the victory of the country's reunification as there are the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration provided by leader Kim Jong Il and the inexhaustible power of all the compatriots who advance in unity in the spirit of "By our nation itself". 
					
					 The editorial calls for dynamically advancing the country's reunification movement full of fresh faith and optimism under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: KCNA Issues Detailed Report on 5th Anniversary of October 4 Declaration
articles.content:
KCNA Issues Detailed Report on 5th Anniversary of October 4 Declaration
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency issued a detailed report "The 5-year-long history of the bedeviled north-south relations says" on Thursday, the 5th anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 The gist of the report is as follows:
					
					 The adoption of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, practical program of the former, marked a great event to shine in the history of the reunification movement of the Korean nation, the one and only nation in the world that has suffered from disgrace and pains for more than half a century due to its division. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean Lee Myung Bak regime during its tenure of office blatantly challenged the national reunification declarations, mercilessly infringed upon the idea of "By our nation itself" and brought about the worst phase of confrontation between compatriots.
					
					 It tarnished the idea of "By our nation itself" as "national chauvinism", "narrow-minded nationalism" and the root cause of "insecurity".
					
					 The Lee group malignantly blustered that "it would not be dragged by the north without a principle though it may not sit with the north for dialogue during its 5-year tenure of office" and that "it is ready to leave the inter-Korean relations frozen till the end of its tenure."
					
					 It carried out the overhaul of the "Ministry of Unification" to turn it into one of anti-reunification and reshuffled even Chongwadae and Intelligence Service to staff them with die-hard anti-reunification elements keen on inciting confrontation.
					
					 As regards the positive and broad negotiations proposals made by the DPRK through the joint statement of its government, political party and organizations, the puppet regime categorically denied them, asserting "sincerity is not in view" and "it might be a tactics".
					
					 Therefore, no proper dialogue was possible between the north and the south during Lee Myung Bak's office.
					
					 The Lee group brutally clamped down on the persons concerned with the joint declarations and their supporters and went the lengths of repressing the former "presidents" who signed the June 15 Joint Declaration and October 4 declaration, forcing them into deaths.
					
					 The present inter-Korean relations have taken up the confrontation structure more serious than the one in the period of the Cold War before the adoption of the June 15 declaration, and plunged into the one reminiscent of a fierce war.
					
					 The group, in alignment with its U.S. master, rounded off the "OPLAN 5027" and "OPLAN 5029" to be the more provocative war plans and confirmed a pre-emptive attack on the DPRK as the orientation of its "military policy toward the north".
					
					 It also revised the military reaction programs and operational rules so that the military units may ignite a war at any time.
					
					 Begging its U.S. master to extend the 2012 transfer deadline of wartime operational control, the Lee group even takes part in the dangerous "Proliferation security initiative of weapons of mass destruction" and U.S.-led establishment of missile defence system which its predecessors dared not attempt and turned south Korea into a base for igniting a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 Traitor Lee and the military war maniacs have held more than a thousand of war drills against the DPRK for the past 5 years under various codenames including Ulji Freedom Guardian, Key Resolve, Foal Eagle, Hoguk.
					
					 They mapped out a "scenario for invading the north" the main content of which is "civil operation" on the premises of waging a special warfare targeting the headquarters of the DPRK, preempting strikes at its nuclear and missile bases and occupying its territory. And they committed such dangerous acts of applying them to the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills in August.
					
					 Pursuant to the new U.S. defense strategy and hostile war policy toward the DPRK, the Lee group has massively introduced various latest military equipment and mass destruction weapons and, at the same time, has got frenzy to conclude a military agreement with Japan and form the triangular military alliance with Japan and the U.S.
					
					 Due to the military confrontational rackets kicked up by the puppet regime, the waters around the 5 controversial islands in the west sea which the north and the south agreed to turn into peaceful waters have already turned into the world biggest hotspot where a second Korean war may break out.
					
					 After the great loss to the nation in December of last year, the Lee group of traitors committed unethical crimes against the nation, an unprecedentedly thrice-cursed politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK, stunning the entire nation and humanity.
					
					 Uncountable is the damage the civilian economic cooperation and the overall economy of south Korea suffered due to its reckless acts against the nation.
					
					 Due to its moves to check the north-south cooperation between NGOs, lots of non-governmental cooperative enterprises and organizations ended their existence or are on the verge of bankruptcy.
					
					 The south Korean pubic are denouncing the Lee Myung Bak regime as "the most broken regime in morality in history", saying "they can not but consider how it could so rapidly break the south-north relations in such a short period". They are now contending that it is attributable to its pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese traitorous nature.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak conservative group was driven into a miserable plight of not being allowed to remain as a member of the nation due to its crimes against the nation and reunification.
					
					  Such a piteous lot of traitor Lee goes to prove that he will get only self-destruction through his anti-DPRK confrontation, and that the idea of "By our nation itself" is, indeed, a desire of the Korean nation and a truth of history.
					
					 The stand and attitude to the historic north-south joint declarations are a touchstone distinguishing patriotism from quislingism and reunification from division. The implementation of the joint declarations guarantees the nation's livelihood, reunification and peaceful prosperity.
					
					 The DPRK is invariable in its stand to advance hand in hand with anyone if he sincerely desires the country's reunification and wishes for the nation's peace and prosperity, and to make responsible and persevering efforts to accomplish the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					 All the compatriots in the north, south and overseas will mercilessly smash the vicious moves of the separatist forces for escalating confrontation against reunification, and certainly usher in the new era of independent reunification and peaceful prosperity that proudly advances in the spirit of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: S. Korean Police Officers Hold Biggest Share of Offenders
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Officers Hold Biggest Share of Offenders  
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- It was recently disclosed that the police officers hold the biggest share of offenders in south Korea, drawing public criticism, according to the south Korean CBS on Tuesday.
					 The Judicial Affairs Department in data submitted to the "parliament" clarified that the crimes committed by officers of the police agency numbered more than 890 cases out of 3 500 plus cases by public officials in the period from January to June. 
					
					 The police agency topped the list of the "government" departments and offices and this situation has continued for three consecutive years, according to the data.
					
					 Among the offenders are officers of the Judicial Affairs Department, the Supreme Prosecutor's Office and courts.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Nigerian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article on its Internet website on Sept. 20 to mark the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The article said that Kim Jong Il was elected general secretary of the WPK when the DPRK was undergoing harsh ordeals after the passing of President Kim Il Sung and due to the persistent moves of imperialists for stifling the DPRK and continued natural disasters.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il unfolded the plan for building a thriving socialist country.
					
					 The DPRK successfully launched the first artificial satellite Kwangmyongsong-1 developed by its own efforts in August 1998.
					
					 He formulated the Songun politics as a basic political mode under socialism. He also fully applied the Songun politics, while providing ceaseless military leadership.
					
					 Under his Songun leadership, the single-minded unity of the DPRK reached a new phase, the overall national power grew tremendously in scope and strength and even the nuclear deterrence was provided.
					
					 The WPK let the popular policies such as the universal free medical care and free compulsory education be constantly enforced in the closing years of the last century when the country was undergoing the ordeals due to the imperialists' offensive against socialism.
					
					 The article said that the light industrial bases conducive to improving the people's livelihood have been fortified in different parts of the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Although Kim Jong Il passed away, the WPK holds him in high esteem as its eternal general secretary.
					
					 His exploits in building the WPK will shine forever along with the DPRK winning victory after victory.

articles.title: Indonesian Paper Denounces S. Korean Regime
articles.content:
Indonesian Paper Denounces S. Korean Regime
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Indonesian newspaper Suara Karya on Sept. 27 carried a commemorative article on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 It said:
					
					 The present south Korean regime totally denied the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration from the outset of its office and continuously plotted sordid cases, typically the "Cheonan" warship sinking.
					
					 It even dared to disparage the supreme dignity of the Korean nation, which Koreans value more than their lives, and slander it. This touched off a wave of anger among the Korean people.
					
					 The south Korean regime must stop the anti-DPRK smear campaign and the suppression of the patriotic reunification forces because they hamper national reconciliation and unity and go against the reunification.
					
					 Whether the north-south relations are improved or not absolutely depends on the attitude of the south Korean regime.
					
					 Even a trifling incident may lead to an all-out war in the Korean Peninsula where huge forces are standing in acute confrontation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities must end the reckless war exercises against the DPRK which they stage in collusion with the U.S. and arms build-up in order to remove the danger of the war and achieve the durable peace.
					
					 If the south Korean regime positively responds to the call of the peace-loving DPRK, it would help ensure the peace and security in the Koran Peninsula.
					
					 If it sincerely wishes for the improvement of the north-south relations and the reunification of the nation, it should not raise absurd preconditions and excuses aimed at deterring the north and the south from making reconciliation and cooperation.
					
					 It should contribute to the improvement of the north-south relations and reunification by providing the free visits and exchange of people of all strata.
					
					 The June 15 north-south joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are the banner for independent reunification and national prosperity that the whole Korean nation should invariably hold aloft.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Foreign media introduced the DPRK from Sept. 25 to 28.
					 The Chinese Xinhua News Agency, reporting about its journalist's visit to the Korean Film Studio, said that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il left the traces of leadership to the Studio, putting their hearts and souls into developing the country's film arts.
					
					 A Malaysian newspaper said under the title of "Do not allow the West's distorted propaganda any longer" that the DPRK is a mysterious country, indeed.
					
					 Even though it fought a war, it was rehabilitated very quickly, the paper said, and went on: 
					
					 The Korean people are strong in their faith and patriotism.
					
					 They are sincerely admiring their leaders.
					
					 The West Sea Barrage and other monuments built by the Koreans show the strength and potentials of the DPRK and the tremendous mental power of its people.
					
					 Affected by the Western media's distorted propaganda, some people have a wrong understanding of the DPRK.
					
					 We must no longer allow the West's distorted propaganda.
					
					 If one wants to know about the DPRK, one must see the country for oneself.
					
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea said in its Internet website that the DPRK is holding fast to the line of giving priority importance to idea and military affairs even though it suffers from the economic blockade imposed by the West including the U.S. and Japan, adding that the country is gaining fresh successes in its economic construction, vigorously advancing along the independent road.

articles.title: DPRK's Struggle Supported by Bangladeshi Figure
articles.content:
DPRK's Struggle Supported by Bangladeshi Figure
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- M. Gamrul Huda, chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, made public a statement on Sept. 27 on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 He recollected that the north-south summit meeting took place in Pyongyang amid great expectation and hope of the people inside and outside Korea in 2007 following a historic summit in June 2000, adding that this culminated in the adoption of the "Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity".
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The adoption of the October 4 declaration helped the north and south open up the era for contact and dialogue in several fields and national reconciliation and cooperation as well as for peace and reunification.
					
					 But the Lee Myung Bak regime has totally denied the north-south declarations and constantly kicked up the provocative moves such as large-scale joint military exercise and state-sponsored, politically-motivated hideous terrorism against DPRK.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the just struggle of the Korean people to independently achieve the country's reunification by the Korean nation itself by adhering to and implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Settle Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Settle Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Recently the mayor of Osaka in Japan told reporters "there is no evidence proving that comfort women were walked away, violated and threatened by the Japanese army." He went the lengths of calling for debate on such evidence.
					 Enraged at the remarks, Kim Pok Dong, a south Korean survivor of the sexual slavery, disclosed the Japanese imperialists' crimes related to the drafting of Korean women as sex slaves, saying, "I am a witness."
					
					 The brazen-faced reactionaries of Japan, including the mayor, have openly denied its past war crimes, turning away the already-displayed clear evidence pieces on the sexual slavery.
					
					 Over more than half a century after the defeat of the Japanese imperialism in August 1945, many survivors have cried out for the settlement of Japan's crimes related to the sex slavery. Their outcry still remains in memory of the world people.
					
					 According to a survey report made by the Committee on Measures for the Former Korean Sex Slaves for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims in January 2004, Pak Yong Sim, a "pregnant sex slave" in one of the photographs testifying to the crimes, said: We (sex slaves) had to serve 20 to 30 Japanese soldiers, little different from beast, a day. If we resisted a bit or were not polite to them, they assaulted rudely and then dragged us by the hair into a "punishment hut". 
					
					 Her crying image and testimonies stunned the world as soon as they were released. This is an undeniable evidence of history that lays bare the brutality and barbarity of the Japanese fascists and the crimes of the then Japanese authorities.
					
					 International law does not allow prescription for such crimes related to the basic human rights as a "crime against humanity."
					
					 Japan is obliged by international law to take legal and moral responsibility for its past crimes on the principle of the war laws and regulations and international humanitarian law.
					
					 It is the trend of the times and worldwide tendency that any country makes apology and compensation for its past crime. Various countries, including Germany, have admitted their responsiblity for the past crimes and made apology and reparations for them from long ago.
					
					 But, it is only Japan that has distorted and denied its past crimes under the eyes of victims, and its ulterior intention is to drag on the time and then evade the responsibility.
					
					 Japan is eager for death of the victims and witnesses, but it is mistaken.
					
					 Everywhere in Asia there still remain victims, witnesses and evidence pieces proving the atrocities done by the Japanese imperialists, and any crime can never be erased in history.
					
					 The Japanese authorities had better discard their wrong attitude toward the past crimes committed against the Korean people and honestly admit them and make apology and reparations to the victims and their bereaved families.

articles.title: West's Presence Renders Persian Gulf Insecure: Iranian President
articles.content:
West's Presence Renders Persian Gulf Insecure: Iranian President
						
 Tehran, October 3 (KCNA) -- President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad of Iran said that the illegitimate presence of the Western countries is the main cause of insecurity in the Persian Gulf region. 
					 Ahmadinejad made the remarks in an interview with CNN's Fareed Zakaria in GPS program which was aired on Sunday. 
					
					 "If the Western countries want to establish security in the region, the first thing they should do is to exit from the Middle East region," he noted. 
					
					 Asked if any attack is launched against Iran by the Zionist regime what will be Iran's response to that attack, Ahmadinejad responded that Iranians have never ushered in a war, but if any attack takes place Iran can fully defend itself.

articles.title: Algeria, Mauritania Call for Reform of UN Security Council
articles.content:
Algeria, Mauritania Call for Reform of UN Security Council
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The reform of the United Nations and its Security Council is one of the topics widely discussed during the week-long General Debate of the UN General Assembly.
					 Algerian and Mauritanian foreign ministers have brought the topic to their specific goal -- Africa should get a permanent seat on an expanded Security Council, when addressing on Sep. 29.
					
					 They underscored the need to revise the working methods of the Security Council to ensure democratization.

articles.title: South Africa to Develop New High-resolution Satellite
articles.content:
South Africa to Develop New High-resolution Satellite
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- South Africa will develop a new high-resolution satellite to serve the economic growth.
					 South Africa is seeking to develop the new earth observation satellite in four and a half years.
					
					 The new satellite would be sent into low earth orbit to provide high-resolution images for climate change and disaster management programs, which would be crucial to the economic growth like industry, agriculture and fishery.

articles.title: U.S. Drone Strike Kills 3 Pakistanis
articles.content:
U.S. Drone Strike Kills 3 Pakistanis
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. forces in Afghanistan have killed Pakistanis under the signboard of "anti-terrorism".
					 Three innocent Pakistanis were killed and two injured in the U.S. drone strike on Monday in North Waziristan of Pakistan, infuriating the people.

articles.title: Acto por dia de publicacion de Declaracion del 4 de Octubre
articles.content:
Acto por dia de publicacion de Declaracion del 4 de Octubre
						
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 4 en la Casa Central de Obreros el acto de la ciudad de Pyongyang dedicado al 5o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Dae, presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, Ryu Mi Yong, presidenta del CC del Partido Chondoista Chong-U, Choe Jin Su, presidente de la Direccion Nortena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP), los funcionarios de organizaciones sociales, los miembros del Comite Norteno por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y las Direcciones Nortenas de la APRP y la Alianza Pannacional de Jovenes y Estudiantes por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APJERP), los trabajadores capitalinos, los jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					  El informe del acto estuvo a cargo de Yang Hyong Sop, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema.
					
					  El dijo que gracias a la publicacion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, se hizo posible resolver de manera independiente y conforme a la demanda y los intereses de la nacion coreana todos los problemas relacionados con la reunificacion bajo el ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					  El Dirigente Kim Jong Il llevo al climax el entusiasmo de los coreanos por la reunificacion independiente en el interior y exterior del pais al propiciar la aprobacion de la susodicha declaracion y abrio el periodo esplendido de la reconciliacion y la nacion nacional sin precedentes en la historia del movimiento por la reintegracion territorial del pais, destaco Yang y prosiguio:
					
					  Despues de publicacion de la declaracion en cuestion, se realizaron con dinamismo el contacto y el dialogo en varias ramas incluyendo la politica, la economia y el plano militar, por ejemplo, el dialogo de primeros ministros del Norte y el Sur, y se constituyeron los aparatos de promocion comun entre el Norte y el Sur, de manera que la ejecucion de la declaracion se desarrollara con energia en el nivel pannacional.
					
					  Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar aprendieron el principio de que en el camino de unir las fuerzas de los connacionales residen la via de lograr la reunificacion de la patria y la prosperidad comun y el futuro radiante de la nacion.
					
					  La Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio, que preparo el Dirigente como gran programa de la reunificacion independiente del nuevo siglo, y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre manifiestan evidentemente su justicia y vitalidad aun en medio de las severas dificultades interpuestas en el camino por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					  Ahora en el Sur de Corea y en ultramar se avivan furiosamente las llamaradas de la lucha masiva por seguir impulsando la epoca del 15 de Junio y sentenciar rotundamente a la banda titere surcoreana que ahogo la aspiracion y el deseo de los coreanos por la reunificacion practicando en su mandato la politica de sumision a las fuerzas foraneas y la de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					  La causa de reunificacion de la patria de los grandes Generalisimos, quienes abrieron maravillosas perspectivas de la prosperidad nacional, avanza vigorosamente gracias al Mariscal           Kim Jong Un.
					
					  El Mariscal defiende y mantiene firmemente la idea y las lineas de los grandes Generalisimos sobre la reunificacion de la patria y sus hazanas inmortales y llama con energia a todos los coreanos a la lucha por cumplir esa empresa.
					
					  La historica Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre son el legado precioso que dejo el Dirigente a los coreanos y la bandera de reunificacion independiente a levantar invariablemente toda la nacion.
					
					  Hoy en dia, se interrumpieron el dialogo, las negociaciones, el contacto y el viaje reciproco entre ambas partes coreanas y fracaso el proyecto de cooperacion humanitaria, lo cual se debe a las fuerzas opositoras a la reunificacion como la horda de Lee Myung Bak que nego totalmente las declaraciones conjuntas.
					
					  En actualidad, la salida para normalizar las relaciones N-S, eliminar el peligro de guerra y abrir la nueva epoca de reunificacion independiente y prosperidad comun esta en mantener y ejecutar las declaraciones arriba mencionadas.
					
					  Nos esforzaremos activamente por dar continuidad a la nueva epoca de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad, o sea, la epoca de reunificacion del 15 de Junio, levantando la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, programa de reunificacion del nuevo siglo, y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programa de implementacion de la primera.

articles.title: Publicada informacion detallada de ACNC
articles.content:
Publicada informacion detallada de ACNC
						
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 5o aniversario de publicacion de la historica Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea hizo publica el dia 4 la informacion detallada "Acusa el lustro de la ruptura de las relaciones Norte-Sur". 
					Se transmite abajo el resumen del texto:
					
					La aprobacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programa de ejecucion de la primera, fue un acontecimiento trascendental en la historia del movimiento por la reunificacion de la nacion coreana que sufre mas de un medio siglo la verguenza y dolores como unica nacion dividida en este mundo. 
					
					Sin embargo, en desafio frontal a estas declaraciones pro-reunificacion de la nacion, el poder titere surcoreano de Lee Myung Bak durante el periodo de su mandato infringio brutalmente el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y trajo la confrontacion fratricida nunca vista en la historia nacional. 
					
					Insulto ese ideal como "nacionalismo chovinista y estrecho" y fuente de la "inquietud de seguridad". 
					
					Dijo con mala intencion que "no dejare arrastrarme por el Norte sin principios si bien se quede en suspension el dialogo Sur-Norte durante un lustro" y "estoy decidido a dejar en congelacion las relaciones Sur-Norte hasta el final de mi mandato".
					
					Reestructuro completamente el Ministerio de Unificacion con el fin de convertirlo en un aparato anti-reunificacion y sustituyo hasta a los agentes de Chongwadae y el Servicio de Inteligencia por los maniacos de confrontacion y anti-reunificacion. 
					
					Cuando el gobierno, partidos politicos y  entidades de la RPDC en su declaracion conjunta propusieron las negociaciones activas y amplias, las nego sin motivo alguno diciendo que "no se ve la sinceridad" y "seria una tactica". 
					
					Asi que en todo el periodo de mandato de Lee Myung Bak no se realizo ninguna vez un dialogo efectivo entre el Norte y el Sur. 
					
					Ademas, reprimio bestialmente a las personalidades relacionadas con la Declaracion Conjunta y sus partidarios y acoso y llevo a la muerte a los ex "presidentes" que firmaron la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre. 
					
					Hoy dia, las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas forman una estructura mas conflictiva que en el periodo de la guerra fria antes de la aprobacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y se hallan en la coyuntura de guerra. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos adicionaron y completaron con los contenidos mas provocativos los planes de guerra de agresion a la RPDC como "OPLAN 5027" y "OPLAN 5029" en confabulacion con su amo norteamericano y fijaron el ataque preventivo contra ella como "politica militar sobre el Norte de Corea". 
					
					La banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak modifico la guia de enfrentamiento militar y reglamentos operacionales para favorecer a las unidades militares provocar la guerra en cualquier momento.
					
					Imploro a su amo norteamericano el prolongamiento del periodo de traspaso del mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra, cuyo recibo fue programado hasta 2012, y se incorporo al establecimiento del sistema de defensa antimisil y a la "Iniciativa de Seguridad contra la Proliferacion" (PSI en ingles) en que hasta sus antecesores no se atrevieron a tomar parte, de modo que el suelo surcoreano se convirtio en una base de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC. 
					
					Durante los ultimos cinco anos, el traidor Lee Myung Bak y los belicistas de la capa militar surcoreana libraron en mil y cientos de ocasiones con EE.UU. los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC tales como "Ulji Freedom Guardian", "Key Resolve", "Foal Eagle" y "Hoguk".
					
					Trazo el "guion de agresion al Norte" basado en la "operacion civil" con la premisa de la guerra especial contra la Direccion de la Revolucion de la RPDC, el ataque preventivo a las bases nucleares y de misiles de ella y la ocupacion a sus zonas y lo aplico en los ejercicios belicos conjuntos "Ulji Freedom Guardian" desarrollado en agosto pasado. 
					
					En adhesion a la nueva estrategia de defensa nacional y la politica de guerra contra la RPDC de EE.UU., introdujo en gran cantidad los equipos belicos ultramodernos de toda indole y armas de exterminio masivo mientras se desespera por concertar el convenio militar con Japon y fabricar la alianza militar tripartita. 
					
					Debido a la campana militar de la banda traidora, la zona maritima de cinco islas del Mar Oeste que se proyectaba convertirla en una area pacifica comun del Norte y el Sur se hizo la zona mas candente del mundo. 
					
					Los crimenes antinacionales y antieticos de la banda traidora cometidos despues del gran duelo nacional sufrido en diciembre del ano pasado son provocaciones politicas sin precedentes que consternaron a la nacion coreana y los demas pueblos del mundo. 
					
					La imprudencia antinacional del traidor Lee causo incontables perdidas en la cooperacion economica civil y la economia surcoreana en conjunto. 
					
					Debido al impedimento de la cooperacion civil Norte-Sur, desaparecieron o fracasaron muchas companias y entidades surcoreanas que se animaban con la aprobacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio. 
					
					El circulo social surcoreano denuncia que "como el poder de Lee Myung Bak pudo romper tan rapido las relaciones Sur-Norte en el corto periodo de su mandato" y que "el poder de Lee es el mas corrupto en moralidad en la historia" y revela que esto se debe a la naturaleza vendepatria, proyanqui y projaponesa. 
					
					La banda conservadora de Lee Myung Bak se encuentra en la situacion miserable en que no puede vivir mas junto con la nacion coreana por sus crimenes antinacionales y anti-reunificacion. 
					
					El destino tragico del traidor Lee comprueba que la confrontacion anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea trae el arruinamiento y que el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" es la aspiracion de la nacion y la verdad de la historia. 
					
					La posicion y la actitud sobre la historica Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur es la piedra de toque que distingue el patriota del vendepatria y la reunificacion de la division. 
					
					La reunificacion, la paz y la prosperidad de la nacion coreana consisten en la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta. 
					
					La RPDC tiene la invariable posicion de cooperar con quienes desean de veras la reintegracion territorial del pais y la paz y prosperidad de la nacion y hacer los esfuerzos pacientes y responsables por lograr la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar frustraran despiadadamente las brutales maniobras fratricidas y anti-reunificacion de las fuerzas separatistas y abriran sin falta la nueva era de reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad que marche vigorosamente con el espiritu de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".

articles.title: RPDC se unira a los esfuerzos de ONU por paz y estabilidad del mundo
articles.content:
RPDC se unira a los esfuerzos de ONU por paz y estabilidad del mundo 
						
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- Al hacer uso de la palabra el dia primero en la reunion plenaria del 67o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, el jefe de la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dijo como sigue: 
					Acorde al ideal de su politica exterior de independencia, paz y amistad, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea fortalecera y desarrollara aun mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con todos los paises que respetan su soberania, y se unira de modo activo a los esfuerzos de los miembros de las Naciones Unidas por defender la paz y la estabilidad del mundo y lograr el desarrollo sostenible.
					
					Hoy en dia, se libra en Corea una intensa lucha por edificar un Estado prospero socialista teniendo al Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Maximo Dirigente del partido, el Estado y el ejercito.
					
					Actualmente, prosiguen en la escena internacional el uso de fuerzas armadas para violar la soberania, intervenir en asuntos internos y derrocar el regimen de otros paises y los actos terroristas de Estado.
					
					Para el cumplimiento pleno del papel central de la ONU en las relaciones internacionales, esta organizacion multinacional debe ser democratizada, sobre todo, es imperioso fortalecer la facultad de su Asamblea General.
					
					Es justo que la Asamblea General, que representa la voluntad general de los paises miembros, dirija todas las actividades de la ONU, sobre todo, ella debe ser facultada de examinar finalmente las resoluciones del Consejo de Seguridad sobre la paz y la seguridad, tales como la sancion y el uso de fuerzas armadas.
					
					La reforma del Consejo de Seguridad, articulo nuclear de la reestructuracion de la ONU, debe llevarse a cabo en el principio de asegurar en sus actividades la responsabilidad, la transparencia, la imparcialidad y la objetividad y garantizar en su composicion la representatividad de los paises en vias de desarrollo.
					
					Se debe poner fin en el debate de DDHH a la politizacion, la selectividad y la pauta de doble rasero y no se puede permitir nunca que continuen siendo cuestionada o silenciada la situacion de DDHH de los paises seleccionados en funcion de la meta politica e intereses del Occidente y segun la norma del valor occidental.
					
					Debido a la invariable politica hostil de Estados Unidos a la RPDC, la Peninsula Coreana se convirtio hoy en la zona mas candente del mundo donde continua el circulo vicioso de confrontacion y exacerbacion de tensiones y cualquier minimo chispazo puede expandirse a la guerra termonuclear.
					
					Mientras no se elimine la politica hostil de EE.UU. a la RPDC, no se puede solucionar ningun problema, incluso el nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana, he aqui el balance del proceso de dialogo con EE.UU. y la leccion aprendida en la practica.
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC estrechara la mano con cualquier hombre que desee sinceramente la reunificacion del pais, la reconciliacion y la prosperidad de la nacion y realizara esfuerzos responsables y pacientes por cumplir la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria frustrando con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion la intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras y las maniobras de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion por la division perpetua de Corea.

articles.title: Nota de entendimiento sobre cooperacion agricola Corea-China
articles.content:
Nota de entendimiento sobre cooperacion agricola Corea-China
						
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo rubricada el dia 4 en esta capital una nota de entendimiento sobre la cooperacion en la rama agricola entre los Ministerios de Agricultura de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y de la Republica Popular China.
					En la ceremonia de firmas estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana el viceministro Ri Sok Chol y otros funcionarios del Ministerio de Agricultura y por la china, los miembros de la delegacion del Ministerio de Agricultura encabezada por su viceministro Niu Dun y un miembro de la embajada china acreditada en Corea.
